item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 8, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. On the Nature of Time (30 points | 1 comment)

3. Do you want to measure signal from the body, muscle, brain it is open-source (18 points | 5 comments)

10. Instant (YC S22) is hiring a founding engineer to help build a modern Firebase ( | hide)
11. Show HN: Kotlin Money (321 points | 184 comments)

22. Daemonization in Unix programs is probably about restarting programs (49 points | 24 comments)
23. A Language of Beautiful Impurity (42 points | 9 comments)
24. BP abandons goal to cut oil output, resets strategy (54 points | 45 comments)
25. ABC News hacks into popular robot vacuum, watches owner through camera (189 points | 64 comments)
26. Unicode shenanigans: Martine Ã©crit en UTF-8 (46 points | 7 comments)
27. A popular but wrong way to convert a string to uppercase or lowercase (111 points | 128 comments)
28. The missing middle: firms in developing countries (69 points | 141 comments)
29. The real data wall is billions of years of evolution (78 points | 42 comments)
30. X reinstated in Brazil after complying with court demands (58 points | 23 comments)
